biotools.summary: This project is a simple grid environment providing a set of Web service (WS) operations, together with bundling them workflows, prepared for the Taverna Workbench. Target application area is the System Biology field, in particular, analysis of kinetic models of biological systems.

bioschemas.name: Tav4SB
